actions.name: Wimp Out

cost.trigger: An attack is resolved against the user and the user meets the [Desperation 1/2] Condition.

actions.description:
Trigger: An attack is resolved against the user and the user meets the [Desperation 1/2] Condition.

Effect: The user freely Moves up to the Movement Score of their choice away from the attacking creature. If the user is an owned Pokemon, they may Switch out from battle as a Free Action, allowing their trainer to Switch In a replacement as a Free Action.
